comment.author: 40317964@N06
comment._content: This photo was printed backward. The stenciling on the B&O hopper car is a dead giveaway.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
so.hammond guy: Thanks for the eagle-eye observation here! Most likely the print we have in the collection is also backward. We can make a notation in the descriptive information.

Jerry (U.S. National Archives)
